column1: I with my family planning to visit Lviv in beginning of June But now is warning by WHO aboutepidemic of measles in Ukraine including the Lviv rigeon .Somebody now's specific information about the city of Lviv ?
It sort of slows down now. The main epidemic was in winter.Your child vaccinated?

Hi !There is no children traveling with us , but one of adults is my daughter in law and she is pregnant and very worried aboutthis .This is my root trip to Lviv with all my family , that I left46 years ago and prepared forlong time .Edited: 1 year ago
Your daughter in law who is pregnant should probably stay at home. Others may go.

She should discuss with her Ob/Gyn. They can draw serum titers to see if she has adequate immunity as well as give recommendations for her particular case.
Yes and it also depends on the term of her pregnancy. On late stages of pregnancy its not allowed to fly.
